lead_paragraph: Thousands of people have gathered in the mainly Kurdish of Diyarbakir to celebrate the Newroz spring festival. Authorities made arrests in other parts of the country where the festivities were banned.

headline.main: Thousands in Diyarbakir Celebrate Newroz Amid Tight Security
headline.print_headline: Thousands in Diyarbakir Celebrate Newroz Amid Tight Security

snippet: Thousands of people have gathered in the mainly Kurdish of Diyarbakir to celebrate the Newroz spring festival. Authorities made arrests in other parts of the country where the festivities were banned.
